info.name: Dashboard Executive APIs
info.description: Complete API collection for Dashboard Executive module - 15 APIs for Hospital Statistics, Financial, Operational, and Facilities monitoring

item.name: 1. Hospital Statistics

request.description:
Mengambil total kunjungan pasien berdasarkan rentang waktu.

**Parameters:**
- range: daily | weekly | monthly | yearly (required)

**Data Source:** registrasi

query.description: Number of days for trend analysis (default: 30)

request.description:
Mengambil nilai BOR (Bed Occupancy Rate) realtime dan tren.

**Parameters:**
- trend_days: integer (optional, default: 30)

**Data Source:** history_bed, ms_bed

**Formula:** BOR = (Total Hari Perawatan) / (Jumlah Tempat Tidur × Jumlah Hari) × 100%

Melihat status antrian IGD secara realtime.

**No parameters required**

**Data Source:** registrasi, ms_jenis_layanan

**Status Classification:**
- normal: 0-50 patients
- padat: 51-75 patients
- kritis: 76+ patients

Menampilkan ruang/tempat tidur yang tidak terpakai (kapasitas idle).

**No parameters required**

**Data Source:** history_bed, ms_bed

**Includes:**
- Total beds
- Occupied beds
- Idle beds
- Idle percentage
- Smart recommendation

item.description: APIs for monitoring hospital operational statistics

item.name: 2. Financial

request.description:
Perbandingan pendapatan vs biaya operasional dengan trend.

**Parameters:**
- trend: daily | weekly | monthly (optional, default: daily)

**Data Source:** penjualan

**Note:** operational_cost is always null (data not available)

Pendapatan per jenis layanan (RJ, Ranap, IGD, Lab, Radiologi, OK).

**Parameters:**
- range: monthly | yearly (optional, default: monthly)

**Data Source:** penjualan, ms_jenis_layanan

**Service Types:**
- RJ (Rawat Jalan)
- Ranap (Rawat Inap)
- IGD (Emergency)
- Lab (Laboratory)
- Radiologi (Radiology)
- OK (Operating Room)

Status klaim BPJS (outstanding, in progress, potential reject).

**No parameters required**

**Data Source:** registrasi, ms_asuransi

**Status:**
- outstanding: status_registrasi = 1
- in_progress: status_registrasi = 2
- potential_reject: always null (data not available)

Biaya rata-rata per pasien dengan trend.

**Parameters:**
- trend: daily | monthly (optional, default: daily)

**Data Source:** penjualan

item.description: APIs for financial monitoring and revenue analysis

item.name: 3. Operational/Services

request.description:
Jumlah pasien per jenis layanan (RJ, Ranap, IGD) dengan detail per unit.

**Parameters:**
- unit: poli | ruang (optional)
- date: YYYY-MM-DD (optional, default: today)

**Data Source:** registrasi, antrian_list, history_bed, ms_poliklinik, ms_ruang

Rata-rata waktu tunggu pasien dari registrasi sampai diproses.

**Parameters:**
- range: daily | monthly (optional, default: daily)

**Data Source:** antrian_list

**Calculation:** tgl_diproses - createdAt

Jumlah tindakan medis (Lab dan Radiologi).

**Parameters:**
- range: daily | monthly (optional, default: daily)

**Data Source:** lab_regis, rad_regis

**Includes:**
- Total lab actions
- Total radiology actions
- Daily trend

Top 10 diagnosa dengan trend.

**Parameters:**
- days: integer (optional, default: 30)

**Data Source:** assesment_medis_rjalan, assesment_medis_igd, cppt, ms_tipe_tenaga_medis

**Includes:**
- Top 10 diagnosis with count
- Daily trend of total diagnoses

item.description: APIs for operational and service monitoring

item.name: 4. Facilities & Capacity

request.description:
BOR (Bed Occupancy Rate) realtime per ruang.

**No parameters required**

**Data Source:** ms_ruang, ms_kamar, ms_bed, history_bed

**Formula:** BOR = (occupied / capacity) × 100%

**Includes:**
- Room name
- Total capacity
- Occupied beds
- BOR percentage per room

Daftar dokter yang sedang on-call.

**Parameters:**
- date: YYYY-MM-DD (optional, default: today)

**Data Source:** jadwal_dokter, ms_dokter, ms_specialist

**Includes:**
- Doctor name
- Specialist
- Shift time

Utilisasi ruang operasi (OK).

**Parameters:**
- date: YYYY-MM-DD (optional, default: today)

**Data Source:** jadwal_operasi, ms_ruang

**Formula:** % Utilisasi = (Total Usage Hours / Total Availability Hours) × 100%

**Note:** Availability = 8 hours per room per day

**Includes:**
- Per room utilization
- Summary of all operating rooms

item.description: APIs for facilities and capacity monitoring
